meanings.definition: A military unit typically consisting of several battalions
meanings.sent1: The regiments marched in perfect formation on the parade ground.
meanings.sent2: The general commanded the regiments to advance towards the enemy.
meanings.sent3: The regiments decided to have a dance-off instead of a battle.
meanings.sent4: The regiments of clouds in the sky resembled an army ready for war.
meanings.sent5: The regiments of ants worked together to carry the food back to their nest.
